item.title: 对特朗普交易的反思已经开始
item.description: 本周，唐纳德-特朗普在大选中获胜，他将重塑经济和政治格局，而市场的焦点正是围绕着他。【原文：Markets have singularly revolved around Donald Trump’s election triumph this week and he will reshape the economic and political landscape.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜为可再生能源空头押注增加 13 亿美元收益
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选后，本周可再生能源类股大跌，这对押注清洁能源的做空者来说无疑是一大利好。【原文：This week’s selloff in renewable energy stocks following Donald Trump’s election victory has been a boon for short sellers betting against clean energy.】

item.title: 由于汽车销售不景气，JLR 旗下塔塔汽车公司利润未达预期
item.description: 捷豹路虎的印度母公司报告称，由于南亚国家整体消费低迷，汽车销售疲软，季度利润低于预期。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover’s Indian parent reported quarterly profit that missed estimates on weaker car sales amid an overall consumption slump in the south Asian nation.】

item.title: 在英国多年的悲惨遭遇之后，英镑成为特朗普风暴中的避风港
item.description: 投资者押注英镑会反弹，这与十天前英国的大额支出预算加剧了数周的抛售时的情况截然不同。【原文：Investors are betting on a rebound for the pound, a sudden u-turn from just 10 days ago when the UK’s big-spending budget exacerbated weeks of selling.】

item.title: 世界粮食价格指数因生产担忧创 18 个月新高
item.description: 全球食品价格在 10 月份创下 18 个月以来的最高水平，不利的天气引发了对许多商品生产的担忧，并有可能使消费者的成本在更长时间内持续走高。【原文：Global food prices hit the highest level in 18-months in October, with unfavorable weather raising production concerns for many commodities and threatening to keep consumer costs higher for longer.】

item.title: 受金属和一次性收益提振，韦丹塔公司利润超出预期
item.description: 据韦丹塔有限公司（Vedanta Ltd.）周五发布的一份声明称，受金属收入增加和之前费用回拨的推动，该公司截至 9 月份的季度净利润达到 435 亿卢比（约合 5.16 亿美元）。【原文：Vedanta Ltd. reported a 43.5 billion rupees ($516 million) net-profit for the quarter through September, boosted by higher revenue from metals and a write-back of earlier charges, according to a Friday statement.】

item.title: 伯恩斯坦称乌克兰天然气过境结束对价格影响不大
item.description: 伯恩斯坦分析师认为，俄罗斯天然气继续流经乌克兰只会对今冬欧洲燃料价格产生很小的影响。【原文：A continuation of Russian gas flows through Ukraine would only have a small impact on European fuel prices this winter, according to Bernstein analysts.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后货币期权交易量飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国总统大选后，货币期权交易量创下历史新高，交易员们急于押注美元进一步上涨。【原文：Trading of currency options swelled to a record after Donald Trump’s victory in the US presidential election, as traders rushed to bet on further dollar gains.】

item.title: 阿斯利康在中国市场的暴跌可能难以撼动
item.description: 本周伊始，阿斯利康公司的市场估值约为 1,710 亿英镑（2,220 亿美元）。到周四收盘时，阿斯利康的市值已跌至 1,500 亿英镑多一点，这家制药公司也被壳牌公司挤下了英国市值最大公司的宝座。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc started the week with a market valuation of about £171 billion ($222 billion). By the close on Thursday it had slumped to little more than £150 billion and the drugmaker had lost its spot as the UK’s biggest company by market value to Shell Plc.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜当日美股吸引 6 月以来最大资金流入
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师称，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布取得总统大选决定性胜利的当天，周三有高达 200 亿美元的资金流入美国股票基金。【原文：A whopping $20 billion flowed into US equity funds on Wednesday, the day Donald Trump claimed a decisive victory in the presidential election, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 捷克中央银行行长敦促采取紧缩政策，紧缩预算
item.description: 捷克央行行长表示，全球利率需要高于冠状病毒大流行之前的水平，并敦促各国政府平衡预算，以帮助控制通货膨胀。【原文：The Czech central bank governor said global interest rates need to be higher than before the coronavirus pandemic and urged governments to balance their budgets to help keep inflation under control.】

item.description: 中国最新的债务置换计划令股票投资者感到失望，市场观察人士现在将注意力转向即将召开的政策会议，以寻找进一步的刺激线索。【原文：China’s latest debt swap plan disappointed stock investors, with market watchers now turning their focus to upcoming policy meetings for further stimulus clues.】

item.description: 在警方使用致命暴力驱散了前一天震撼马普托的选举后抗议浪潮之后，莫桑比克首都周五恢复了平静。【原文：Calm returned to Mozambique’s capital on Friday after police used deadly violence to break up a wave of post-election protests that shook Maputo the day before.】

item.title: 奇货可居：互联网是如何被垃圾充斥的（播客）
item.description: 曾几何时，Twitter 是发布突发新闻的好帮手。Instagram 和 Facebook 等社交媒体是与朋友保持联系的好帮手。过去，人们会整天刷新一些网站，从他们熟悉和信任的来源阅读新闻或八卦。而现在，这些都已不复存在，或者至少发生了巨大变化。利益驱动、政治动机和人工智能的结合颠覆了旧互联网的大部分内容。那么，到底发生了什么？为什么网络【原文：There was a a point in time when Twitter used to be good for breaking news. Social media outlets like Instagram and Facebook were great for keeping up with friends. There used to be websites that people would refresh throughout the day, reading news or gossip from sources they knew and trusted. Now, most of that has gone — or at least changed dramatically. A combination of profit imperatives, political motivations, and AI have upended much of that old internet. So what happened? Why has the web】

item.title: 贷款增加、准备金减少，SBI 盈利超出预期
item.description: 印度国家银行第二季度利润超出分析师预期，主要得益于强劲的信贷增长和较低的贷款损失拨备。【原文：State Bank of India’s second-quarter profit beat analyst estimates, helped by strong credit growth and lower provisioning for loan losses.】

item.title: 债务计划不尽如人意，中国股市期货和人民币汇率下滑
item.description: 在中国政府宣布了一项6万亿元（8,390亿美元）的地方政府债务再融资计划后，中国股市和人民币均出现下跌，这表明投资者对支持经济的最新尝试并不看好。【原文：Chinese stocks and the yuan declined after authorities announced a 6 trillion yuan ($839 billion) program to refinance local government debt, signaling investors weren’t impressed with the latest attempt to support the economy.】

item.title: Amundi 首席投资官认为美国债券收益率接近股票的 "警戒线
item.description: 欧洲最大的资产管理公司 Amundi SA 首席投资官表示，美国的收益率离吸引投资者从股票转向债券的水平并不遥远。【原文：US yields aren’t far from levels that would lure investors from stocks into bonds, according to the chief investment officer of Amundi SA, Europe’s biggest asset manager.】

item.title: 中国推出 1.4 万亿美元债务置换计划帮助地方政府
item.description: 中国宣布了一项 10 万亿元人民币（合 1.4 万亿美元）的地方政府债务再融资计划，中国政府正在推出更多措施来支持面临唐纳德-特朗普连任带来的新风险的经济放缓。【原文：China announced a 10 trillion yuan ($1.4 trillion) program to refinance local government debt, as Beijing rolls out more measures to support a slowing economy facing new risks from the reelection of Donald Trump.】

item.title: 土耳其上调通胀预测，缩小与市场的差距
item.description: 在物价涨幅连续两个月超过预期后，土耳其央行上调了今明两年的通胀预期，使其更接近市场预期。【原文：Turkey’s central bank raised its inflation forecasts for this year and next, bringing them closer to market expectations after price gains exceeded estimates for two consecutive months.】

item.title: 英国航空公司所有者超出预期，缩减 2024 年运力目标
item.description: 由于对跨大西洋航线的需求增加，IAG SA 公布的第三季度盈利超出预期，并表示预计今年下半年将继续保持强劲的财务表现。【原文：IAG SA posted third-quarter earnings that beat estimates on higher demand for trans-Atlantic routes, and said it expects the strong financial performance to continue for the rest of the year.】

item.title: 食品配送平台 Swiggy 首次公开募股最后一天售罄
item.description: 印度食品配送平台 Swiggy Ltd. 13 亿美元的首次公开募股在最后一天的竞价中全部售出，不过由于大型投资者的早期需求疲软，销售速度有所放缓。【原文：Indian food-delivery platform Swiggy Ltd.’s $1.3 billion initial public offering was fully sold on the final day of bidding, though at a slower pace due to weak early demand from large investors.】

item.title: 印度在分析师投诉后提前发布 GDP
item.description: 印度政府将国内生产总值和通货膨胀的发布时间提前到了当天早些时候，因为分析师们说他们没有足够的时间来分析这些数据。【原文：India’s government moved the release times for gross domestic product and inflation to earlier in the day after analysts said they didn’t have enough time to analyze the figures.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德的 Healthscope 公司获得 11 亿美元贷款协议豁免权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，澳大利亚医院运营商 Healthscope Ltd. 获得了贷款人对其 16 亿澳元（11 亿美元）贷款的契约豁免，从而使该公司有更多的时间与医疗保险公司协商提高报销额度。【原文：Healthscope Ltd., an Australian hospital operator, received a covenant waiver from lenders on a A$1.6 billion ($1.1 billion) loan to give the firm more time to negotiate higher reimbursements from health insurers, according to people familiar with the matter.】
